keywords.indexterm: Editing JSON Documentsconvert XML to JSON

taskbody.context: The steps for converting an XML document to JSON are the following:

step.cmd: Go to menu Tools XML Tools XML to JSON... .

stepresult.ph: The XML to JSON dialog is displayed:

step.cmd: Choose or enter the Input URL of the XML document.
Choose the Output file that will contain the conversion JSON result.
Check the Open in Editor option to open the JSON result of the conversion in the JSON Editor

result.p: The operation result will be a document containing the JSON conversion of the input XML URL.
